mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( userEmail, userPassword, userNickName, userName, userRegDate, enabled ) VALUES ( #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userNickName}, #{userName}, NOW(), 0 )
INSERT INTO email_confirm ( emailKey, userEmail, userRegDate, expiredDate ) VALUES ( #{emailKey}, #{userEmail}, NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 SECOND) )
mapper.update: UPDATE user u INNER JOIN email_confirm e ON u.userEmail = e.userEmail SET u.enabled = 1 WHERE e.emailKey = #{emailKey};
mapper.select: SELECT userNo AS userNo, userEmail AS userEmail, userNickName AS userNickName, userName AS userName, userRegDate AS userRegDate, userProfilePath AS userProfilePath, enabled AS enabled, authority AS authority FROM user WHERE userEmail=#{userEmail} AND userPassword=#{userPassword} AND enabled=1
